content: I belong here, I belong to this world. My being is a message to the world.
I am allowed to feel good.
I am allowed to feel happiness.
I deserve to succeed.
I am kind and compassionate toward others.
I am kind and compassionate toward myself.
I deserve to be treated with kindness.
My body is a home for my life.
I am a positive force in the world.
I can learn and I can grow.
I am in charge of myself.
I deserve freedom and peace.
I have grace and compassion for my mistakes.
I am my own home.
I am worthy.
I am loved.
In this moment, I am safe and secure.
I am willing to see love available to me in this experience.
I learn from my mistakes.
I am a good person.
I am more than my job.
I bring worth to other's life.
I've survived before, I can do it again.
I am present.
I am my greatest believer.
I can get through difficulties.
My self-care is a priority.
I am allowed to set boundaries.
I am allowed to say no.
I am allowed to ask for help.
I am allowed to take up space.
I deserve to rest.
I am committed to my personal growth.
Every day I am better than before.
I learn and grow through difficulty.
